title: As a user I want to be able to run the Top Salaries report
custom_preconds: GIVEN "Top Salaries" is a report in the Report listing widget
custom_steps: WHEN user selects this report from the widget
custom_expected:
THEN system should launch the prompts according to the requirements
ANd entering the desired prompts and running the report should work and match the requirements
AND the report will have an LDAP associated with it (see story for LDAP)

title: As a user, I want a custom reports popup for running the DL Summary Report from the reports widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with permissions to print DL Summary Report
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Disabled List Summary Report" link from the reports listing widget
custom_expected:
THEN a custom EBIS UI prompt modal should display (similar to modal for other reports)
AND prompt filters should match what's listed in the data discovery (https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/EBIS4-TXT-5645+Report+Prompts)
AND running the report with the desired prompts should print the report matching the Details and Layout Listed in the wiki (https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/EBIS4-TXT-5642+Report+Details , https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/EBIS4-TXT-5641+Report+Layout)

title: As a user I want to be able to run the Assignment Bonus report
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user logs in
custom_steps: WHEN user is in Report listing widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Assignment Bonus" report should be listed. 
AND Selecting this report from the widget will launch the prompts according to the requirements. 
AND Entering the desired prompts and running the report will work and match the requirements. 
AND The report will have an LDAP associated with it. Please provide the LDAP when the story is delivered and a user id to test the report and security with.

title: As a user I want to be able to run the DL Recert Report from Recertification screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in Recertification utility
custom_steps: WHEN user is on the "DL Recertification" tab for BOC and Club users
custom_expected:
THEN there is a "Run Report" button. 
AND Clicking this will launch the report prompt for the DL Recertification Maintenance report.
AND The prompt should default to the current year and allow the user to adjust the parameters and run the report, just like if they accessed this from the Report screen.

title: As a user I want to be able to run the Average Salary LRD Report
custom_preconds: GIVEN "Average Salary LRD" is a report in the Report listing widget
custom_steps: WHEN user selects this report from the widget
custom_expected:
THEN system should launch the prompts according to the requirements
AND entering the desired prompts and running the report should work and match the requirements
AND the report will have an LDAP associated with it(see story for LDAP)

title: As a User, I want to Navigate to and view the filter section of the Arb Eligibles Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN "Arb Eligibles" appears as a tab under the Major Contracts dashboard
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the Major Contracts link in the left nav
custom_expected:
THEN system should open the dashboard
AND the tabs should appear in alpha order
AND the layout of the Utility should match the provided wireframe
AND the fields should match the provided data discovery

title: As a User, I want to view Past Year Results on Arb Eligibles Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with permissions for the Arb Eligibles Utility
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Arb Eligibles Utility
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to select a past year from the Year filter
 AND clicking View button should load the utility with players from the year selected
 AND population displayed should also meet the criteria set by the other filters
 AND the layout of the result columns should match the provided wireframe
 AND the columns should match the provided data discovery

title: As a User, I want to view the Arb Status filter on Arb Eligibles Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with permissions for the Arb Eligibles Utility
custom_steps: WHEN user views Arb Eligibles Utility
custom_expected:
THEN system should allow user to filter utility population based on players' status
 AND possible values should match the provided Data Discovery
 AND mapping should follow the attached Salary Arb Status Chart

title: As a User, I want to view the Signed/Unsigned filter on Arb Eligibles Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with permissions for the Arb Eligibles Utility
custom_steps: WHEN user views Arb Eligibles Utility
custom_expected:
THEN system should allow user to filter utility population based on players' status
 AND possible values should match the provided Data Discovery

title: As a User, I want to view the Elig Count filter on Arb Eligibles Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with permissions for the Arb Eligibles Utility
custom_steps: WHEN user views Arb Eligibles Utility
custom_expected:
THEN system should allow user to filter utility population based on players' Eligible Count
 AND possible values should match the provided Data Discovery
AND logic for determining Elig Count should be pulled from ebis1

title: As a User, I want to Update the Arb Eligibles Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in Arb Eligibles Utility
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on 'Edit' button on the Utility
custom_expected:
THEN system will reload the utility in Edit Mode
AND All of the filters will become disabled when the form is in edit mode
AND The columns that are editable will match the provided wire and data discovery (not all columns are editable)

title: As a User, I want to save changes to the Arb Eligibles Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in Arb Eligibles Utility in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN enters new value and clicks on 'Save' button
custom_expected:
THEN system will save all of the entered values, and reload the utility in View mode
AND A successful blue notification should also display.

title: As a User, I want to View the Hearing Info modal on the Arb Eligibles Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in Arb Eligibles Utility in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on 'INFO' button on a Player's row
custom_expected:
THEN system will open the Hearing Info modal
AND The layout of the modal will match the provided wireframe
AND The fields will match the provided data discovery
AND If the Arb Utility is in view mode when the modal is opened, the modal will be in view mode
AND If the Arb Utility is in edit mode when the modal is opened, the modal will be in edit mode
AND Clicking the Ok button or the 'X' will close the modal

title: As a User, I want to Update the Hearing Info modal on the Arb Eligibles Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in Arb Eligibles Utility in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on 'INFO' button on a Player's row
custom_expected:
THEN system will open the player's Hearing Info modal in edit mode
AND The editable fields will match the provided data discovery and wire
AND Clicking the Ok button or the 'X' will close the modal and retain the changes made to the modal
AND Clicking 'Cancel' will close the modal and discard the changes made to the modal
AND The Info button will appear blue for players who have data entered into their modal

title: As a User, I want to Save updates made to the Hearing Info modal on the Arb Eligibles Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in Arb Eligibles Utility in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on 'INFO' button on a Player's row to open the Hearing info Modal in Edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN there will be an Ok button and an 'X' icon
AND When either one is the clicked, the modal will close, retaining any changes made
AND When the modal is closed, the Utility will still be in edit mode
AND There will be a Save button on the Utility
AND Clicking Save will save all changes, including those made to the Modal, and reload the utility in View mode
AND There will be a Cancel button on the Utility
AND Clicking Cancel will call all changes, including those made to the Modal, and reload the utility in View mode

title: As a User, I want to switch between different player's Hearing Info modals on the Arb Eligibles Utility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in Arb Eligibles Utility edit mode
AND the system allows users to quickly enter Hearing Details and Filing Numbers for each player without having to open and close each player's modal
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on 'INFO' button on a Player's row to open the Hearing info Modal(both edit and view mode)
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a Previous button and a Next button
AND Clicking the Previous button will refresh the Modal with the hearing info of the previous player appearing in the utility
OR Clicking the Next button will refresh the Modal with the hearing info of the next player appearing in the utility
AND If any data had been entered, it will be retained when the player is switched

title: Rule to Prevent Saving the Utility with Blank Rows
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in with permissions for editing the Arbitration Eligible Utility
AND user is viewing the utility in edit mode
AND user has added a new row to the utility
BUT user has NOT entered a player name in the new row
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Save
custom_expected:
THEN system should run required field rule check on "Player Name"
AND system should throw a blocker message preventing user from saving utility
AND clicking Back should return the user to the utility in edit mode

title: As a BOC User, I want to delete a player from the Arb Eligibles Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the BOC user is in Arb Eligibles Utility in Edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on 'Delete' button next to a player (Delete icon is available on each player's row.)
custom_expected:
THEN system will remove the player from the arb list
AND If the user saves their updates, the Utility will reload in view mode and the player will not appear in the list
AND If the user cancels their updates, the Utility will reload in view mode and the player will return to the list
NOTE: This can be done at any time, even after the results are marked final

title: As a User, I want to finalize the Arb Eligibles Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the BOC user is in Arb Eligibles Utility in Edit or View mode
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on Finalize button on the Utility in both Edit and View Mode
custom_expected:
THEN system locks the Utility and prevent Club users from making updates 
AND Stops the population from updating automatically (no players added or removed)

title: Arb Eligibles Utility Permissions - BOC MJ Contracts
custom_preconds: GIVEN Arb Eligibles Utility permission varies for different BOC users
custom_steps: WHEN user is in Arb Eligibles Utility
custom_expected:
THEN BOC Admin will have the following permission 
 - View, Update, Finalize
AND BOC Basic will have the following permission
 - View

title: As a BOC admin I want to run the MJ Award Bonus Batch
custom_preconds: GIVEN "MJC Award Bonus Batch" is a batch option under the "Major Contracts" section on the batch screen
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "MJC Award Bonus Batch"
custom_expected:
THEN system should open the batch in the batch screen 
AND the batch parameters should display per the batch requirements
AND a "Run" button should be available
AND clicking "Run" should run the batch according to the selected parameters
AND when the batch is run system should: 
    - Get Contracts with Award Bonus Terms, Salary Escalators and Conditional Options that are currently in an Approved, Update Approved, Expired or Approved for Next Year status that contain a contract with an Award Bonus or criteria that is not yet marked official
    - Iterate over contacts containing awards
    - Process Award 
    - Check for bonus terms and place finished values
    - Update salaries/earned amounts as necessary
    - Calculate Vesting Options
    - Calculate LRD Present Values
    - Calculate Earn Assignment Bonuses
    - Calculate Bonus Maximums
    - Calculate LRD Salary
    - Calculate Total Guaranteed 
    - Set offered and earned bonus amounts
    - Save contract
AND results should only include players who had a contract updated by the batch and should display in the "Batch Results" widget
AND available columns should be Player ID, Player's Name, Org, Club, and Roster Status
AND batch run information should display in the batch history widget.

title: As a BOC admin I want to running the MJ Award Bonus Batch to generate notifications
custom_preconds: GIVEN a BOC user is attempting to run the MJ Award Bonus Batch
custom_steps: WHEN user runs the batch in Update Mode
custom_expected:
THEN a notification should be generated for any clause that is updated
AND if an award bonus is marked earned, Notification #1 should be generated for the BOC MJC Admin and the Club MJC Admin that the player is currently signed with
AND if a salary escalator with an award criteria is marked earned, Notification #3 should be generated for the BOC MJC Admin and the Club MJC Admin that the player is currently signed with 
AND if an Option with an award criteria is marked earned, Notification #6 should be generated for the BOC MJC Admin and the Club MJC Admin that the player is currently signed with

title: Update Draft & Scouting tab title to be consistent on all profiles
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on Professional/ Domestic Amateur Player Profile
custom_steps: WHEN user is in Draft & Scouting tab of the player profile
custom_expected:
THEN Professional profile tab should read Draft & Scouting
AND Domestic Amateur profile tab should read Draft & Scouting

title: As a user I want investigation results entered in LARI to be reflected in ebis
custom_preconds: GIVEN user logged into Lari and Ebis 2
custom_steps: WHEN investigation results are entered in LARI
custom_expected: THEN the investigation information should be communicated back to ebis according to the business rules and the data discovery of the Investigation Form.

title: As a user I want attempts to communicate information to LARI that fail to not be lost forever
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is performing some action in EBIS which will send information or files to LARI (saving investigation etc)
custom_steps: WHEN the attempt to send information or files to LARI fails because of an inability to establish a connection between the two systems
custom_expected:
THEN system should queue the items to be sent and continue to try at regular intervals until the system can successfully transmit the information
AND if after a pre-determined amount of time the system can still not communicate the information to LARI, then the system should cease efforts and send a failure email

title: As a user I want to receive an email when any LARI communication fails
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is performing some action in EBIS which will send information or files to LARI (saving investigation etc)
custom_steps: WHEN the attempt to send player or investigation information or files to LARI  fails to be sent to LARI because of an error with the data or file
custom_expected: THEN an email should be generated detailing the piece of information that failed, along with the Player ID associated with the information and the reason for failure
